name: Porygon-Z
author: Naoki Saito
flavor_text: Its programming was modified to enable it to travel through alien dimensions. Seems there might have been an error…

ancient_trait.name: θ  Stop
ancient_trait.effect: Prevent all effects of your opponent’s Pokémon’s Abilities done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Digital Reboot
attacks.effect: Devolve as many of your Benched Pokémon as many times as you like. Put each Evolution card removed this way into your hand.

attacks.name: Dazzle Blast
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.
